DOC.brief_summary: The purpose pilot study determine whether adipose tissue lose ability expand response overfeed old compare young men . The investigator hypothesize adipose tissue response overfeeding may weaken old compare young men , thereby lead worsen ectopic storage depot old men .
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot study begin address whether adipose tissue biology change advance age . Specifically , test whether adipose tissue lose ability expand response overfeed old compare young men . To test possibility Investigators recruit overweight mildly obese old ( age 55-75y ) young ( age 25-40y ) men collect adipose tissue biopsy 7 day overfeed . The investigator test well cell adipose tissue expand response overfeed whether differs young old men .
DOC.criteria: Men Aged 2540y OR 5575y BMI 2835 kg/m2 Weight stable ( ±2kg past 3 mo ) Sedentary moderately active ( < 3 d/wk exercise last > 20min ) Nonsmokers ( never use quit > 7yrs prior ) Women Currently use hormone , glucose lipid lower medication Engaged exercise diet program Currently gain lose weight use weight loss drug Diabetes mellitus ( diagnosis , treatment , FBG ≥126 mg/dL ) Uncontrolled metabolic disorder ( e.g. , thyroid )
